poem_en: It was a troubling time for a troubling line, so he wrote as he went and counted in time, typing to the beat and carving out rhymes. And as he meandered through his mind, he found but a gem of a thought. It didn't make sense, for it was and was not Schrodinger's memory.
poem_it: Era un periodo tormentato per un verso tormentoso, così scriveva mentre procedeva e contava nel tempo, digitando al ritmo e intagliando rime. E mentre si attardava nella sua mente, trovò soltanto una gemma di pensiero. Non aveva senso, perché era e non era la memoria di Schrödinger.
